label: 藤原敦基
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (1045-1106). Son of Akihira. Older brother of Atsumitsu. Father of Chikamitsu, Shigeaki, and Yoshiaki. Kanshi in Honchō mudaishi 本朝無題詩 (20), Chūyū ki burui shihai kanshishū 中右記部類紙背漢詩集 (12), Shinsen rōeishū 新撰朗詠集(1), and Wakan kensakushu (5). Waka in Wakan kensakushu (1) Prose compostions in Honchō zoku monzui 本朝続文粋 (13). [明衡、周光、茂明、令明、漢詩、和漢兼作集、和歌]
